data.comment: The match is underway at Stade des Costieres.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nimes.
In the minute 1, Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Nimes.
Jonathan Gradit (Lens) has received a first yellow card.
Ball goes out of play for a Lens goal kick.
In the minute 3, Lamine Fomba is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Nimes in their own half.
In the minute 6, Can Lens capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Lens's Gael Kakuta misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Nimes at Stade des Costieres.
In the minute 7, In Nimes Lens drive forward through Jonathan Clauss. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Lens have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
Corner awarded to Lens.
In the minute 8, Nimes have a goal kick.
Free kick Lens.
Nimes's Lamine Fomba looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
Nimes to take a throw-in in Lens territory.
Ball safe as Lens is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
Nimes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Lens in the half of Nimes.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Nimes in the half of Lens.
Nimes have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
Birger Meling for Nimes drives towards goal at Stade des Costieres. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 16, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Lens.
Throw-in for Nimes in their own half.
In the minute 18, Frank Schneider awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Nimes at Stade des Costieres.
Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Nimes.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Lens in their own half.
Can Lens get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nimes's half?
In the minute 23, Lens advance rapidly upfield but Frank Schneider blows for offside.
In Nimes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Frank Schneider signals a Nimes throw-in in Lens's half.
In the minute 24, Nimes to take a throw-in in Lens territory.
Throw-in Lens.
Free kick for Nimes in the half of Lens.
In the minute 25, Nimes are caught offside.
Frank Schneider awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Nimes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 28, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Nimes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lens's half?
Free kick Nimes.
In the minute 29, Frank Schneider signals a Nimes throw-in in Lens's half.
Throw-in for Nimes in the half of Lens.
Frank Schneider awards Lens a goal kick.
In the minute 31, Lens are pushing forward but Florian Sotoca's finish is wide of the goal.
Frank Schneider awards Nimes a goal kick.
Frank Schneider signals a Lens throw-in in Nimes's half.
In the minute 32, Nimes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Lens in their own half.
Lens have a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Goal! Ignatius Kpene Ganago gives Lens a 0-1 lead.
Gael Kakuta with an assist there.
Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, In Nimes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can Lens get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nimes's half?
Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Lens at Stade des Costieres.
Lens to take a throw-in in Nimes territory.
Frank Schneider awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Lens in the half of Nimes.
Can Lens capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nimes's half?
Throw-in Nimes.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Frank Schneider will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Lens in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Lens at Stade des Costieres.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Frank Schneider has blown to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Nimes in the half of Lens.
In the minute 46, Steven Fortes is replacing Jonathan Gradit for Lens at Stade des Costieres.
Can Nimes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lens's half?
In the minute 47, Lens awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Lens is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 49, Lens to take a throw-in in Nimes territory.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Nimes.
Facundo Medina (Lens) has received a yellow card from Frank Schneider.
In the minute 51, In Nimes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Nimes in their own half.
In the minute 53, Play has been interrupted briefly in Nimes to check on Ignatius Kpene Ganago, who is grimacing with pain.
Simon Banza (Lens) has replaced the possibly injured Ignatius Kpene Ganago at Stade des Costieres.
Ball safe as Lens is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 57, Frank Schneider signals a Lens throw-in in Nimes's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Lens to take a throw-in in Nimes territory.
In the minute 59, Lens pushes forward through Gael Kakuta, whose finish on goal is saved.
Lens awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Lens have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Lens.
Frank Schneider signals a Nimes throw-in in Lens's half.
Corner awarded to Lens.
In the minute 64, Lens have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
Lens have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
Throw-in for Nimes in their own half.
In the minute 66, Jerome Arpinon is making the team's first substitution at Stade des Costieres with Kevin Denkey replacing Nolan Roux.
Marco Ludivin Majouga is replacing Yassine Benrahou for Nimes at Stade des Costieres.
In the minute 67, In Nimes, Nimes push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
The home team have replaced Gaetan Paquiez with Patrick Burner. This is the second substitution made today by Jerome Arpinon.
Throw-in Nimes.
Free kick in a good position for Lens!
In the minute 69, Simon Banza (Lens) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Nimes at Stade des Costieres.
Throw-in for Nimes at Stade des Costieres.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Lens goal kick.
Throw-in for Nimes in the half of Lens.
In the minute 71, Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Nimes.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Lens in their own half.
In the minute 72, Can Nimes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lens's half?
Lens make their third substitution with Corentin Jean replacing Florian Sotoca.
Frank Schneider awards the away team a throw-in.
Nimes to take a throw-in in Lens territory.
In the minute 74, Frank Schneider awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Nimes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lens's half?
Ball safe as Nimes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 76, Corentin Jean of Lens smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Simon Banza of Lens gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nimes.
In the minute 80, Nimes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Franck Haise (Lens) is making a fourth substitution, with Manuel Perez replacing Gael Kakuta.
Ismael Boura is on a sub for Jonathan Clauss for Lens.
In the minute 83, Lens have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Lens in the half of Nimes.
Lens's Corentin Jean is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to Nimes.
Corner awarded to Nimes.
Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, Zinedine Ferhat grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Stade des Costieres.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Nimes in their own half.
Throw-in for Nimes at Stade des Costieres.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Nimes have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
Free kick Lens.
Throw-in Nimes.
Free kick for Nimes in the half of Lens.
Frank Schneider signals a Nimes throw-in in Lens's half.
Frank Schneider blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
Florian Miguel is replacing Anthony Briancon for the home team.
Manuel Perez (Lens) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
